pullRequest.title: Fix create object value getting null strand passing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

This PR will fix the null strand passing when creating new object values.

Fixes #21018
Approach

The issue arises at the empty object creation that happens during the array filling. The previous implementation passes a null strand as parent for creating the object which causes the issue. This PR modifies it to use the current scheduler and strand for object creation.

Samples

N/A

Remarks

N/A

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage

 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText: visitFrame should be automatically injected by asm, please try removing those.
don't think conditionLinkLabel is used, we can remove it.

please remove getScheduler method, since Scheduler.getStrand() is costly (because it access a thread local) it should be called ones. assign the strand to a local var and access the scheduler form there.

beforeCommit.message: Add current strand parameter to the create object method

afterCommit.message: Remove unnecessary lines and get Scheduler method

beforeCommit.message: Remove unnecessary lines and get Scheduler method

nodes.bodyText: when can an exception occur here?
can we link the created issue here ?

afterCommit.message: Add issue reference to the code

nodes.bodyText: no need to catch Exception for this, just do a null check. Caching Exception is a last resort solution, should try to avoid it when possible.

Lets make this method call the other createObjectValue, that way we can remove most of the body in this method. see default parameter pattern here : https://www.baeldung.com/java-default-parameters-method-overloading
Caching Exception or any runtime exceptions like NullPointerExcption is not a best practice. Replace it with a null check.
let's add a deprecated annotation here.

commit.message:
Fix the null strand and null scheduler passing in empty object creation

This commit relates to the issue #21018

Add unit test case for the fix in empty object creation

Add issue references inside the get Strand method

This commit relates to the issue #21018
